name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Performance】Risu's Isekai Express ： Special Performance Delivery【#RiSekaiExpress】 [995QkX6r7RA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu presents her 2025 Birthday Merch and new original song announcement.
Closing segment of the performance, Risu thanks the viewers and says goodbye.

subtitles.original: Kalian...
subtitles.english: You guys...

subtitles.english: ...can't skip ads this time, guys.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalian harus pantengin sampai selesai.
subtitles.english: So you have to watch until the end.

subtitles.original: Merch untuk birthday tahun ini adalah...
subtitles.english: The merch for this year's birthday is...

subtitles.english: We have a super cool jacket, diorama stand,

subtitles.original: dan juga handuk! Wow, lengkap banget sih.
subtitles.english: and also a towel! Wow, it's really complete.

subtitles.english: In Risu's opinion, this set is for you fathers

subtitles.english: and also umm truck drivers out there.

subtitles.original: Kalau kalian lihat, jaketnya ini keren banget, guys.
subtitles.english: If you look at it, this jacket is really cool, guys.

subtitles.original: Oh jaketnya ini cocok banget buat dipakai jalan-jalan kasual.
subtitles.english: Oh this jacket is really suitable for casual outings.

subtitles.original: Jadi ya bisa lah dipakai buat hangout atau jalan-jalan sama teman gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: So yeah, it can be used for hanging out or going out with friends, guys.

subtitles.original: Kalau kata Risu sih, kalian wajib banget, guys, beli jaket ini
subtitles.english: In Risu's opinion, you guys really must buy this jacket

subtitles.original: biar koleksi Risudrip kalian tuh lengkap.
subtitles.english: so your Risudrip collection is complete.

subtitles.original: Terus, terus... minimal sih kalau kata Risu... beli tiga ya, guys.
subtitles.english: Next, next... at least in Risu's opinion... buy three, guys.

subtitles.original: Habis ini tuh ada buat kalian yang suka pergi ke anime event gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: After this, there's something for those of you who like going to anime events, guys.

subtitles.original: Nah, bisa banget pakai face towel ini.
subtitles.english: Well, you can really use this face towel.

subtitles.original: Gunanya sih, selain untuk ngelap keringat ya,
subtitles.english: The purpose, besides wiping sweat,

subtitles.original: bisa banget buat kalian bawa terus pajang gitu, guys, waktu lagi ada event, panel, konser gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: it can really be brought and displayed, guys, when there's an event, panel, or concert.

subtitles.original: Kalian angkat di atas gitu lho. Terus sekalian bisa apa ya...
subtitles.english: You lift it up like that. Then at the same time you can what is it...

subtitles.original: ...kayak pamer oshi gitu. Hehehe.
subtitles.english: ...like showing off your oshi. Hehehe.

subtitles.original: Terus, terakhir nih ada diorama stand yang lucu, guys.
subtitles.english: Next, lastly there's a cute diorama stand, guys.

subtitles.original: Iya, lucu banget. Cocok banget buat dipajang di meja, di kamar...
subtitles.english: Yes, very cute. Very suitable to be displayed on a table, in a room...

subtitles.original: ...terus bisa juga di dalam mobil, guys.
subtitles.english: ...then it can also be in a car, guys.

subtitles.original: Terus, terus, buat kalian yang beli full set, kalian akan dapat bonus
subtitles.english: Next, next, for those of you who buy the full set, you will get a bonus

subtitles.original: postcard yang ditandatangani langsung oleh Risu.
subtitles.english: postcard signed directly by Risu.

subtitles.original: Asli, guys! Ditandatangani oleh Ayunda Risu. Wow!
subtitles.english: Genuine, guys! Signed by Ayunda Risu. Wow!

subtitles.original: Tunggu apa lagi, guys? Langsung aja borong dan check out.
subtitles.english: What are you waiting for, guys? Go ahead and buy it all and check out.

subtitles.english: Especially the full set.

subtitles.english: Well, you can check out at the link in the description

subtitles.original: atau bisa langsung gas ke website Hololive Official Store.
subtitles.english: or you can go straight to the Hololive Official Store website.

subtitles.original: Oh! Jangan lupa kalau kalian beli full set,
subtitles.english: Oh! Don't forget if you buy the full set,

subtitles.original: nanti akan dapat bonus kartu yang bisa kalian pakai di Hololive Production Official Card Game.
subtitles.english: you'll get a bonus card that you can use in the Hololive Production Official Card Game.

subtitles.original: Terus kartunya hanya ada dalam bahasa Jepang ya, guys.
subtitles.english: And the card is only available in Japanese, guys.

subtitles.original: Nah, terus berhubung kita udah sampai di penghujung acara...
subtitles.english: Well, and since we've reached the end of the show...

subtitles.original: Risu mau bilang terima kasih untuk semua yang sudah ikut di perjalanan Risu Isekai Express.
subtitles.english: Risu wants to say thank you to everyone who joined Risu's Isekai Express journey.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih juga untuk semua ucapan selamat ulang tahun yang kalian berikan untuk Risu.
subtitles.english: Thank you also for all the birthday wishes you gave to Risu.

subtitles.original: Risu sih senang banget ya bisa merayakan ulang tahun Risu dengan kalian semua.
subtitles.english: Risu is very happy to be able to celebrate Risu's birthday with you all.

subtitles.original: Jadi semoga kalian semua juga ya, guys, enjoy perjalanan dan nyanyiannya dari awal sampai akhir.
subtitles.english: So I hope you all too, guys, enjoy the journey and the singing from beginning to end.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih semuanya!
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: Puru-puru...
subtitles.english: Puru-puru...

subtitles.original: ...otsu Risu Isekai Express!
subtitles.english: ...otsu Risu Isekai Express!

subtitles.original: Wae! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Wae! Bye-bye!
